attributes.action: 3 pilots on all flights to be made compulsory
attributes.additional_details:
Hearing the news today that one of the pilots who left the cockpit was unable to get back in is shocking .we need to make sure it is compulsory that all airlines must have 3 pilots on every flight and there are always 2 pilots in the cockpit at all times to protect passengers . We pay enough for flights we should all be protected .keep passengers safe.

please sign this petition we need to change the law
